message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your operations. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $900000 is significantly below the value of the product. I'm willing to come down to $1050000. This price reflects a substantial discount while still ensuring I receive a fair return on my investment. I believe this is a good compromise, and I hope we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1050000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $975000. This is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your continued interest in the product.  While I understand your budget constraints, $975000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $1000000. This is a significant discount from my initial asking price, and I believe it reflects the value you will receive from the product. I hope we can finalize this deal.
